value:
$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm surprised you made it this far.
You've defeated my siblings and
some of the best in Hoshido.$k$pBut now I will stop you here
at the cost of my own life,
if necessary.$k$pI challenge one of you to single
combat. How will you fare against
the High Prince of Hoshido?$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Why do I feel so...reinvigorated?
Is it true what you said? We have
been under someone's control?$k$pIt's all so clear now. You've saved my
kingdom—and rescued me and
my retainers. You have my thanks.$k$pYou also have my apologies for
all we put you through, battling
on behalf of the true enemy.$k

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Excellent work, everyone.
We managed to liberate the
World of Birthright.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I have to admit that I was alarmed
when he shouted about going
into single combat.$k$pThank goodness we were able to
work around that wall. We should
avoid any attempts to separate us!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|It was terrible, wasn't it? Being
split up like that, I thought we might
never see each other again!$k$pAnd...and...$k$p$Sbs2000|$EFace_Pain|And I never EVER want to go
through that again. Not like we did
with our friend Zacharias.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Agreed, Sister.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I've asked you two not to dwell on
Zacharias's disappearance. We did
the best we could.$k$p$EFace_Anger|But I suppose that we owe an
explanation to our friend
$Nu here.$k$pSome time ago, we lost a member
of the Order of Heroes whose
name was Zacharias.$k$pZacharias was a bold fighter and
great comrade. Then one day,
he vanished during a battle.$k$pWe've searched for him, but to no
avail. Now, before we sink into
despair, let's leave this be for now.$k$Sbs150|
